verse.name: v1
verse.lines: While we pray and while we plead, While you see your soul’s deep need, While our Father calls you home, Will you not, my brother, come?

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Why not now? Why not now? Why not come to Jesus now? Why not now? Why not now? Why not come to Jesus now?

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: In the world you’ve failed to find Aught of peace for troubled mind; Come to Christ, on Him believe, Peace and joy you shall receive.

verse.name: v4
